title: must return a negative response when request contains a non-existing case type id
specs: contains a non-existing case type id

body.message: Resource not found when getting case type version for eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9 because of 404 Not Found: [{"message":"Object Not Found for:eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9"}]
